title: Bug 49536: No webapps deployed, accessing URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, a 200 OK HTTP code is returned with no content, instead of the expected 404 HTTP error.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a 200 OK HTTP code with no content.
EB: The expected behavior is to receive a 404 HTTP error when trying to access a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance.
4. Observe the response code, which should be a 404 HTTP error.
